Verifies issue creation for a `Signature-Input` which has expired.
Issue reported: {
    issue : {
        code : SRIMessageSignatureIssue
        details : {
            sriMessageSignatureIssueDetails : {
                error : ValidationFailedSignatureExpired
                integrityAssertions : [
                ]
